com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class BleNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UsesCustomNull
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BleDevice, BleServer

    public abstract class BleNode
extends Object
implements UsesCustomNull
    Abstract base class for BleDevice and BleServer, mostly just to statically tie their APIs together wherever possible. That is, not much actual shared implementation exists in this class as of this writing.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  BleNode.ConnectionFailListener
      Base interface for BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener and BleServer.ConnectionFailListener.
      static interface  BleNode.HistoricalDataLoadListener
      A callback that is used by various overloads of BleDevice.loadHistoricalData() that accept instances hereof.
      static interface  BleNode.HistoricalDataQueryListener
      A callback that is used by select() to listen for when a database query is done processing.

      Returns this endpoint's manager.
      BluetoothGattCharacteristic getNativeCharacteristic(UUID charUuid)
      Returns the native characteristic for the given UUID in case you need lower-level access.
      BluetoothGattCharacteristic getNativeCharacteristic(UUID serviceUuid, UUID charUuid)
      Overload of getNativeCharacteristic(UUID) for when you have characteristics with identical uuids under different services.
      List<BluetoothGattCharacteristic> getNativeCharacteristics_List()
      Convenience overload of getNativeCharacteristics() that returns a List.
      List<BluetoothGattCharacteristic> getNativeCharacteristics_List(UUID serviceUuid)
      Convenience overload of getNativeCharacteristics(UUID) that returns a List.
      Iterator<BluetoothGattCharacteristic> getNativeCharacteristics()
      Returns all BluetoothGattCharacteristic instances.
      Iterator<BluetoothGattCharacteristic> getNativeCharacteristics(UUID serviceUuid)
      Same as getNativeCharacteristics() but you can filter on the service UUID.
      BluetoothGattDescriptor getNativeDescriptor_inChar(UUID charUuid, UUID descUuid)
      Overload of getNativeDescriptor(UUID, UUID, UUID) that will return the first descriptor we find inside the given characteristic matching the given UUID.
      BluetoothGattDescriptor getNativeDescriptor_inService(UUID serviceUuid, UUID descUuid)
      Overload of getNativeDescriptor(UUID, UUID, UUID) that will return the first descriptor we find inside the given service matching the given UUID.

      Overload of getNativeDescriptor(UUID, UUID, UUID) that will return the first descriptor we find matching the given UUID.
      BluetoothGattDescriptor getNativeDescriptor(UUID serviceUuid, UUID charUuid, UUID descUuid)
      Returns the native descriptor for the given UUID in case you need lower-level access.
      BluetoothGattService getNativeService(UUID serviceUuid)
      Returns the native service for the given UUID in case you need lower-level access.
      List<BluetoothGattService> getNativeServices_List()
      Convenience overload of getNativeServices() that returns a List.
      Iterator<BluetoothGattService> getNativeServices()
      Returns all BluetoothGattService instances.
      HistoricalData newHistoricalData(byte[] data, EpochTime epochTime)
      Returns a new HistoricalData instance using BleNodeConfig.historicalDataFactory if available.
      BleNode.HistoricalDataQueryListener.HistoricalDataQueryEvent queryHistoricalData(String query)
      Provides a means to perform a raw SQL query on the database storing the historical data for this node.
      void queryHistoricalData(String query, BleNode.HistoricalDataQueryListener listener)
      Same as queryHistoricalData(String) but performs the query on a background thread and returns the result back on the main thread through the provided BleNode.HistoricalDataQueryListener.
      HistoricalDataQuery.Part_Select select()
      Provides a way to perform a statically checked SQL query by chaining method calls.

      • appData

        public Object appData
        Field for app to associate any data it wants with instances of this class instead of having to subclass or manage associative hash maps or something. The library does not touch or interact with this data in any way.
        See Also:
        BleManager.appData, appData

        protected com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.PA_ServiceManager m_serviceMngr

      • queryHistoricalData

        public BleNode.HistoricalDataQueryListener.HistoricalDataQueryEvent queryHistoricalData(String query)
        Provides a means to perform a raw SQL query on the database storing the historical data for this node. Use BleDevice.getHistoricalDataTableName(UUID) to generate table names and HistoricalDataColumn to get column names.

      • queryHistoricalData

        public void queryHistoricalData(String query,
                                BleNode.HistoricalDataQueryListener listener)
        Same as queryHistoricalData(String) but performs the query on a background thread and returns the result back on the main thread through the provided BleNode.HistoricalDataQueryListener.

        Provides a way to perform a statically checked SQL query by chaining method calls.
